name: Cyrus Adventure
description:
oh no! the princess got kidnapped again by the evil Kora, you must do your best to save her!

A classic platformer game

- fight your way through 4 worlds each with their own style and enemies

- 9 different bosses to fight

- defeat the evil kora!

controls:

Jump: use the "Z" key on the keyboard or "A" on the controller to jump.

Run: use the "X" key on the keyboard or "X" on the controller to run.

Move" use the Arrow keys on the keyboard or the D-pad on the controller to move.

if you encounter any bugs, do tell me in comments so that i can fix them
